entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
